text: today's recipe is great for crowd it's a

and it's really easy to put together

so unfold it onto your surface make sure
that it's lightly floured and have your
oven preheated to 400 degrees

take your puff pastry and blind-bake it
so that it gets nice and golden and dry
so that when you put your quiche filling
